mapper.insert:
insert into notice (NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_SUB, NOTICE_CON, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_KIND, NOTICE_HITS, EMPLOYEE_ID ,NOTICE_FILE, NOTICE_ORG_FILE, NOTICE_FILE_SIZE) values
(PROD_SEQ.nextval,#{noticeSub},#{noticeCon},sysdate, #{noticeKind},0,#{employeeId},
null,null,null #{noticeFile},#{noticeOrgFile},#{noticeFileSize} )
mapper.select: select NOTICE_NO noticeNo, NOTICE_SUB noticeSub, NOTICE_CON noticeCon, NOTICE_DATE noticeDate, NOTICE_KIND noticeKind, NOTICE_FILE noticeFile, NOTICE_HITS noticeHits, EMPLOYEE_ID employeeId from notice where NOTICE_KIND ='자료실'

select NOTICE_NO noticeNo, NOTICE_SUB noticeSub, NOTICE_CON noticeCon, NOTICE_DATE noticeDate, NOTICE_KIND noticeKind, NOTICE_FILE noticeFile, NOTICE_HITS noticeHits, EMPLOYEE_ID employeeId, NOTICE_ORG_FILE noticeOrgFile, NOTICE_FILE_SIZE noticeFileSize from notice where NOTICE_NO =#{noticeNo} and NOTICE_KIND ='자료실'
mapper.update: update notice set NOTICE_HITS = NOTICE_HITS + 1 where NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} and NOTICE_KIND ='자료실'
mapper.delete: delete from notice where NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} and NOTICE_KIND ='자료실'
